Package org.opengrok.web.api.v1.controller

Class SuggesterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.web.api.v1.controller.SuggesterController
  • @Path("suggest")
public final class SuggesterController
extends Object
    Endpoint for suggester related REST queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getSuggestions

        @GET
@Produces("application/json")
public org.opengrok.web.api.v1.controller.SuggesterController.Result getSuggestions​(@Valid @BeanParam
                                                                                    @Valid SuggesterQueryData data)
                                                                             throws org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        Returns suggestions based on the search criteria specified in data.
        Parameters:
        data - suggester form data
        Returns:
        list of suggestions and other related information
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - if the Lucene query created from data could not be parsed

      • getConfig

        @GET
@Path("/config")
@Produces("application/json")
public SuggesterConfig getConfig()
        Returns the suggester configuration SuggesterConfig. Because of the IncomingFilter, the ConfigurationController cannot be accessed from the web page by the remote user. To resolve the problem, this method exposes this functionality.
        Returns:
        suggester configuration

      • rebuild

        @PUT
@Path("/rebuild")
public void rebuild()

      • rebuild

        @PUT
@Path("/rebuild/{project}")
public void rebuild​(@PathParam("project")
                    String project)

      • addSearchCountsQueries

        @POST
@Path("/init/queries")
@Consumes("application/json")
public void addSearchCountsQueries​(List<String> urls)
        Initializes the search data used by suggester to perform most popular completion. The passed urls are decomposed into single terms which search counts are then increased by 1.
        Parameters:
        urls - list of URLs in JSON format, e.g. ["http://demo.opengrok.org/search?project=opengrok&full=test"]

      • addSearchCountsRaw

        @POST
@Path("/init/raw")
@Consumes("application/json")
public void addSearchCountsRaw​(@Valid
                               @Valid List<org.opengrok.web.api.v1.controller.SuggesterController.TermIncrementData> termIncrements)
        Initializes the search data used by suggester to perform most popular completion.
        Parameters:
        termIncrements - data by which to initialize the search data

      • getPopularityDataPaged

        @GET
@Path("/popularity/{project}")
@Produces("application/json")
public List<Map.Entry<String,​Integer>> getPopularityDataPaged​(@PathParam("project")
                                                                    String project,
                                                                    @QueryParam("field") @DefaultValue("full")
                                                                    String field,
                                                                    @QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("0")
                                                                    int page,
                                                                    @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("100")
                                                                    int pageSize,
                                                                    @QueryParam("all")
                                                                    boolean all)
        Returns the searched terms sorted according to their popularity.
        Parameters:
        project - project for which to return the data
        field - field for which to return the data
        page - which page of data to retrieve
        pageSize - number of results to return
        all - return all pages
        Returns:
        list of terms with their popularity
